title: Repainter app for Material You simplifies setup on Google Pixel devices
content:
Repainter is a fun app for Android 12 and beyond that gives users more control over the customized colors of Material You. With its latest update, Repainter is picking up an advanced new trick, as well as simplifying setup on Google Pixel devices.

moreâ€¦

The post Repainter app for Material You simplifies setup on Google Pixel devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Material You tweaking app Repainter has introduced a more streamlined setup process on Google Pixel device.
